content: make your own chubby and squeazy strawberry with chenille yarn the strawberry is about 14 cm tall if you use the yarn and hooks suggested you ll need chenille yarn in red and green 4 00mm crochet hook adjust according to your yarn size 12 mm safety eyes embroidery floss/cotton yarn for sewing eyes and mouth optional toy stuffing stitch marker tapestry needle and scissors you ll need less than 50g of each color
